yy graphics is a graphic design studio operated by designers duo Yul Bae and Youtak Jin based on Seoul. From 2011, we've been working on a startup, and we're working on building a design experience that addresses the challenges of solving problems. Print out the print and screen design, create branding, content, campaign, web / app service design, editing design, and packaging design services.

services
  • Advertising
  • App & Website
  • Branding
  • Commercials
  • Exhibition
  • Illustration
  • Print (Book, Poster, Brochureâ€¦)
  • Packaging
  • Signage
  • Social Media Content
Who we are

Sloppy Yul and Viper Youtak are a strange combination, but they are surprisingly well matched. They majored in communication design at Konkuk University and wiped and wiped the workforce. We are pursuing fun life and wonderful design, but it's not easy to achieve.
